content.body: With shu out, depending on who is in attendance today I'd like to spend some time discussing correlation. I have a rough sketch of a very simple correlation mechanism I've put together here: https://gist.github.com/rbuckton/b00ca9660fb888486da07b22e38dd1e9, though I'd like to hear more about other approaches.
I'd also like to present my idea for re-using modules for correlation -- I have some drawings/images but unfortunately not something in written form
